definition[0]: used to talk about buying and selling foreign money
example[0]: The dollar is expected to fall in the foreign exchange markets.
definition[1]: foreign money, especially money obtained by selling goods to a foreign country
definition[2]: an arrangement through which a student exchanges homes, schools etc with a student from another country for a particular length of time, especially in order to learn a language
example[2]: The school organizes a foreign exchange to France.
